alert.note: Alert for Duplin (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 5:58PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Duplin Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 558 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Warsaw, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Warsaw, Mount Olive, Kornegay, Beulaville, Bowdens, Beautancus, Kenansville, Chinquapin, Albertson, Sarecta, Faison, Magnolia, Greenevers and Calypso. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM EDT for eastern North Carolina.
